attributes.title: No thank you
attributes.review: What is up with this app?! I thought that once I opened the app the color scheme shocked me! One word for ya: O R A N G E. All different shades. Cheeto, macaroni, sunset, the list goes on and on. Not only that but I wanted real information, but ya know wish in one hand...

attributes.review: Absolutely horrible. Do NOT download. Everything is messed up. Nothing works. Ok surprised this is even an app. Why? Just why? This is by far the worst app ever! Nothing works correctly!

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: So hard to navigate and the orange man who seems to be the focal point of the app is incredibly distasteful and rude. Why does he talk like a four year old?? Absolutely disgusting will not be downloading again.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see if he was actually planning on making America better as a whole but, all I seen was a bunch of sexist slurs and directed hate towards Poc. This is a terrible app to own.
